title: Mini-Ep 110: Take Action
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 110: Take Action
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree check-in about the ways they're engaging in unlearning and what steps they're taking to make sure their anti-racist actions are long-term. Plus, a caller walks them through how to use Sephora Beauty Insider Points to make a don...
description:
Kate and Doree check-in about the ways they're engaging in unlearning and what steps they're taking to make sure their anti-racist actions are long-term. Plus, a caller walks them through how to use Sephora Beauty Insider Points to make a donation to the National Black Justice Coalition.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • GRASS ROOTS FARMERS COOPERATIVE - Go to grassrootscoop.com/FOREVER35 for a special, limited time offer of $40 Off, plus Free Shipping!
  • BROOKLINEN - Get 10% off your first order and free shipping when you use promo code FOREVER35, only at Brooklinen.com. 
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • BOOK OF THE MONTH - Treat your shelf to a new book subscription. Your first month’s book is just $9.99 with code FOREVER35 at bookofthemonth.com.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
